title: Supramolecular complexation of phenylephrine by cucurbit[7]uril in aqueous solution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13286-13290
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01910E, Paper

Khaleel I. Assaf, Ayah N. Faraj, Eyad S. M. Abu-Nameh, Mohammad A. Alnajjar
Stable host–guest complexation between phenylephrine and cucurbit[7]uril macrocycle in water is reported.
